Package sample

Class DBconnections

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.DBconnections
  • public class DBconnections
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all JDBC functions including connecting, table creation and deletion, and data selecting

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DBconnections()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.sql.Connection connect()
      Connects to database darkestdata
      static void create​(java.sql.Connection MyConn)
      Creates table Darkest_Data, table has 10 columns, hero class, name, level, and 7 skills, name being the Primary key
      static void delete​(java.sql.Connection MyConn)
      deletes table Darkest_Data, used to reset the table for testing purposes
      static void insert​(java.sql.Connection MyConn, java.lang.String hero, java.lang.String name, int level, int A, int B, int C, int D, int E, int F, int G)
      Appends table Darkest_Data adding a new hero row
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<ROW> read​(java.sql.Connection MyConn)
      reads the database grabbing all rows and only returning the hero's class and name
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> select​(java.sql.Connection MyConn, java.lang.String name)
      searches the database for a hero and loads the values of their skills and level into an arraylist to be referenced
      static java.lang.Boolean UniqueSelect​(java.sql.Connection MyConn, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> name)
      Searches the database to find any duplicate name entries

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • insert

        public static void insert​(java.sql.Connection MyConn,
                          java.lang.String hero,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          int level,
                          int A,
                          int B,
                          int C,
                          int D,
                          int E,
                          int F,
                          int G)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Appends table Darkest_Data adding a new hero row
        Parameters:
        MyConn - DataBase Connection
        hero - elements of webpage
        name - name of hero class
        level - resolve level of hero, value in combobox
        A - if Skill check box was checked
        B - if Skill1 check box was checked
        C - if Skill2 check box was checked
        D - if Skill3 check box was checked
        E - if Skill4 check box was checked
        F - if Skill5 check box was checked
        G - if Skill6 check box was checked
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException

        name - hero's name

        public static java.lang.Boolean UniqueSelect​(java.sql.Connection MyConn,

        Searches the database to find any duplicate name entries
